string-array.name: waking
string-array.item: You woke me…
Oh?
Who is it this time?
Yes?
Ah
I was having a nap…

string-array.name: compliments
string-array.item: Your smile is contagious
You look great today
You\'re a smart cookie
I bet you make babies smile
You have impeccable manners
I like your style
You have the best laugh
I appreciate you
You are the most perfect you there is
You are enough
You\'re strong
Your perspective is refreshing
You\'re an awesome friend
You light up the room
You deserve a hug right now
You should be proud of yourself
You\'re more helpful than you realize
You have a great sense of humor
You\'ve got all the right moves!
Is that your picture next to "charming" in the dictionary?
Your kindness is a balm to all who encounter it
On a scale from 1 to 10, you\'re an 11
You are brave
You\'re even more beautiful on the inside than you are on the outside
You have the courage of your convictions
Your eyes are breathtaking
You are making a difference
You\'re like sunshine on a rainy day
You bring out the best in other people
Your ability to recall random factoids at just the right time is impressive
You\'re a great listener
How is it that you always look great, even in sweatpants?
Everything would be better if more people were like you!
I bet you sweat glitter
You were cool way before hipsters were cool
That color is perfect on you
Hanging out with you is always a blast
You always know — and say — exactly what I need to hear when I need to hear it
You smell really good
Being around you makes everything better!
When you say, "I meant to do that," I totally believe you
When you\'re not afraid to be yourself is when you\'re most incredible
Colors seem brighter when you\'re around
That thing you don\'t like about yourself is what makes you so interesting
You\'re wonderful

string-array.name: insults
string-array.item: Two wrongs don\'t make a right, take your parents as an example
It\'s better to let someone think you are an Idiot than to open your mouth and prove it
If laughter is the best medicine, your face must be curing the world
If ignorance is bliss, you must be the happiest person on earth
Is your ass jealous of the amount of shit that just came out of your mouth?
The only way you\'ll ever get laid is if you crawl up a chicken\'s ass and wait
It looks like your face caught on fire and someone tried to put it out with a hammer
Shock me, say something intelligent
If you really want to know about mistakes, you should ask your parents
I\'m jealous of all the people that haven\'t met you!
I would love to insult you… but that would be beyond the level of your intelligence
So, a thought crossed your mind? Must have been a long and lonely journey
There\'s only one problem with your face, I can see it
I don\'t know what makes you so stupid, but it really works
Brains aren\'t everything. In your case they\'re nothing
Ordinarily people live and learn. You just live
You are living proof that manure can sprout legs and walk
Stupidity is not a crime so you are free to go
Shut up, you\'ll never be the man your mother is
You\'re so fat, you could sell shade
You\'re about as useless as an asshole with tastebuds
You are not as bad as people say, you are much, much worse
Are your parents siblings?
You\'re proof that the gods has a sense of humor
I\'m not questioning your honor. I\'m denying its existence
You are as useless as nipples on a breastplate
You must have a very low opinion of people if you think they are your equals
